title: Surfing
description: Surf's up, dude! Surfing entertains and informs readers about this fun and exciting sport that has been around for hundreds or perhaps thousands of years! Students will learn about the origins of surfing in ancient Polynesia, its development over time, and some current stars of the sport. Colorful photographs and helpful graphics will keep students engaged while reading. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine cause-and-effect relationships as well as to ask and answer questions to better understand the text.
meta: buoyant, champion, competitors, culture, heat, nose, Polynesian, surfing, tail
